title: Waiting With Biden
sub_head: His presidency is not accomplishing much and maybe was never intended to.
body:
Plausibility is not the only problem for the Biden administration’s preferred explanation for inflation, which it wishes to blame on greedy corporations and their anticompetitive practices.
Investigative findings by Joe Biden’s own agencies are already refuting it. See the conclusion of the Federal Maritime Commission that rising shipping rates are due to Covid disruptions, not to the nefarious designs of shipping companies.
